tool_description: Cancels room bookings and meeting reservations, handles notifications to attendees, and manages refunds or rescheduling.

booking_id.description: Unique identifier of the booking to cancel

notify_attendees.description: Whether to send cancellation notifications to attendees

refund_applicable.description: Whether booking is eligible for refund

error_messages: Booking not found: Specified booking_id does not exist or has already been cancelled.
Cancellation not allowed: Booking cannot be cancelled due to policy restrictions.
Missing cancellation reason: cancellation_reason is required and cannot be empty.
Notification delivery failed: Unable to send cancellation notifications to some attendees.
usage: Provide booking ID and cancellation reason. Optional settings for attendee notifications and refund processing. Returns cancellation confirmation and status.

cancellation_id.description: Unique identifier for the cancellation record

cancellation_status.description: Status of the cancellation (confirmed, pending, failed)

notifications_sent.description: Number of attendees notified of cancellation
